data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Marcela L., Monné, Miguel A. (2015): Lectotype designations of Cerambycidae (Coleoptera) described by E. F. Germar in 1824 and J. C. Klug in 1825 and a new synonymy. Zootaxa 3981 (3): 385-396, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.3.4
